meanings.definition: The process of removing air or gases from a liquid.
meanings.sent1: During the deaeration of the juice, all the air bubbles were carefully removed.
meanings.sent2: The deaeration of the water ensured it was free from any unwanted gases.
meanings.sent3: The deaeration of the soda was so thorough that not even a single bubble remained.
meanings.sent4: Her deaeration technique was so precise, it was like magic making the bubbles disappear.
meanings.sent5: The deaeration process made the liquid as clear as a crystal, with no trace of air left.

meanings.definition: The act of eliminating air bubbles from a substance.
meanings.sent1: The deaeration of the cake batter was essential to ensure a smooth texture.
meanings.sent2: After the deaeration, the paint was ready for a flawless application.
meanings.sent3: The deaeration of the whipped cream was so effective that it looked like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her deaeration skills were so good, it was like she could make the bubbles vanish into thin air.
meanings.sent5: The deaeration process transformed the liquid into a bubble-free masterpiece.
